accessibility_support_other: We always ask if anyone has specific needs and always aim to modify or adjust to suit people's needs. We also follow accessible presentation practices.
description: Want to learn the language of screen readers? Get hot tips on how people use screen readers, plus hands-on experience using NVDA to check if your website works as intended. This course is great for any digital professional who wants to learn more about screen readers and testing with NVDA.
platforms: Our courses are normally conducted via Zoom but we are flexible to the needs of attendees.
prerequisites: No prior knowledge of accessibility is required.
title: Accessibility testing with NVDA
topics: How people use screen readers to access digital content
Different ways of navigating with NVDA
How NVDA should work with different content types
